statements: SELECT * FROM defaults_data WHERE default_flag = TRUE;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM defaults_data WHERE risk_score > 700;
SELECT risk_score, loan_amount, payment_history FROM defaults_data WHERE loan_amount <= 5000;
SELECT * FROM defaults_data WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT customer_id, risk_score, default_flag FROM defaults_data;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, default_flag FROM defaults_data WHERE risk_score > 700 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, payment_history FROM defaults_data WHERE loan_amount > 5000 AND default_flag = TRUE ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM defaults_data WHERE payment_history LIKE '%late%' OR payment_history LIKE '%missed%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM defaults_data WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 AND default_flag = FALSE ORDER BY risk_score ASC
SELECT risk_score, customer_id, loan_amount FROM defaults_data WHERE customer_id IN (1001, 1003, 1005) ORDER BY risk_score DESC
SELECT * FROM default_rates;
SELECT customer_id, default_date FROM default_rates ORDER BY default_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, default_amount FROM default_rates WHERE default_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, risk_level FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_level = 'medium';
SELECT customer_id, risk_level FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY credit_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM default_rates WHERE default_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, default_amount FROM default_rates WHERE default_amount > 5000 ORDER BY default_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, default_amount, risk_level FROM default_rates, risk_assessment WHERE default_rates.customer_id = risk_assessment.customer_id AND risk_level = 'high';
SELECT default_rates.customer_id, default_date, credit_score FROM default_rates JOIN risk_assessment ON default_rates.customer_id = risk_assessment.customer_id ORDER BY default_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_defaults, AVG(default_amount) AS avg_default_amount FROM default_rates GROUP BY risk_level HAVING avg_default_amount > 3000;
SELECT cust_id, default_amount FROM default_rates ORDER BY cust_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE loan_amount > 10000 AND loan_terms = 'Short-Term'
SELECT cust_id, risk_grade, risk_factors FROM risk_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT cust_id, default_amount, default_date, risk_score FROM default_rates WHERE default_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY loan_approval_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM default_rates ORDER BY default_date DESC, default_amount ASC
SELECT cust_id, default_amount, default_date FROM default_rates WHERE cust_id = 1001
SELECT cust_id, AVG(default_amount) AS avg_default_amount FROM default_rates GROUP BY cust_id
SELECT rd.cust_id, rd.default_amount, ra.risk_grade FROM default_rates rd JOIN risk_assessment ra ON rd.cust_id = ra.cust_id
SELECT hd.cust_id, hd.loan_amount, ra.risk_grade FROM historical_data hd LEFT JOIN risk_assessment ra ON hd.cust_id = ra.cust_id
SELECT * FROM default_rates
SELECT customer_id, default_rate FROM default_rates ORDER BY default_rate DESC
SELECT customer_id, default_rate FROM default_rates WHERE default_rate > 0.5
SELECT customer_id, risk_score, assessment_date FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score >= 80
SELECT * FROM loan_details WHERE loan_status = 'approved'
SELECT customer_id, default_rate FROM default_rates ORDER BY customer_id DESC, default_rate ASC
SELECT * FROM risk_assessment WHERE assessment_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, risk_score FROM risk_assessment WHERE risk_score >= 80
SELECT * FROM loan_details WHERE loan_status = 'approved' AND loan_amount > 10000
SELECT h.customer_id, h.loan_id, d.default_rate FROM historical_data h JOIN default_rates d ON h.customer_id = d.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customer_data
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customer_data
SELECT loan_amount, default_status FROM loan_history
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history
SELECT assessment_id, customer_id, risk_score, assessment_date FROM risk_assessment
SELECT customer_name, credit_score, loan_amount FROM customer_data WHERE default_status = true
SELECT * FROM loan_history WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY loan_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM customer_data WHERE credit_score > 700 AND default_status = false
SELECT trend_category, trend_description FROM trend_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_name, risk_score FROM customer_data JOIN risk_assessment ON customer_data.customer_id = risk_assessment.customer_id WHERE risk_score > 80
